release.note: Preparing for public release of source code. Making the VS project work without dependencies, adding docs, etc
This project still has some dependencies on the Krypton Toolkit which I will sort out soon
Added icons to buttons and menu item
Fixed the problem with Control, Alt and Shift keys!
Added Control+= as the Menu/Pad shortcut key
The Stop button has been removed and functionality merged with the start button.
You can now right-click on the key events in the list and remove individual items.
Stop repeated KeyDown events being recorded for Control, Alt and Shift keys which breaks playback of macro. `Bug #8 <http://support.fushnisoft.net/thebuggenie/clarionaddins/issues/8>`_
Added save/restore of last recorded macro
Added :menuselection:`Edit --> Playback Current Macro` menu item with :kbd:`Alt-=` as the shortcut
Debug window now shows up/down arrow characters for a cleaner display
Improved playback stability and fixed some problems with multiple playback when using the keyboard
Code completion is now turned off during plaback. This gives a significant improvment in playback speed and reliability!
Option to automatically disable Code Completion while recording a new macro.
